title: Joshua Tree National Park: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services        Your smart phone will be useful for taking pictures on your Joshua Tree trip, but you will not have cell service in most areas of the park. NPS/Cathy Bell      Cell phone service not available in most of the parkWhile there is cell service in the towns surrounding Joshua Tree National Park, the rugged and remote terrain of the park itself means that very few areas in the park have cell coverage. You should not expect to rely on your cell phone for navigation or emergencies.     Food, gas, lodging, and similar services are not available in Joshua Tree National ParkGet information on services available in nearby communities from area chambers of commerce.Water is available at only a few locations around the park:Oasis Visitor Center in Twentynine PalmsWest Entrance StationBlack Rock CampgroundCottonwood CampgroundIndian Cove Ranger StationBring water with you into the park. See Safety for more information.
